App Name:2nr

App Package Name:pl.rs.sip.softphone

Brief:

2nr presents a revolutionary way to maintain your privacy and security by providing a free, alternative phone number without requiring a new contract, SIM card, or even registration. Ideal for various temporary uses ranging from auctions to job searches, 2nr ensures your primary number stays private while offering a feature-packed service, all you need is a stable internet connection.
